item.description:
This workshop is open to models and photographers as well as friends.

Body Language: What Language Are You Speaking?

Seminar Description

presented by Amy Beaulieu of Success, Simplified!

Do you ever feel like you’re misunderstood or your actions taken the wrong way? Do you ever feel like your foot is too often in your mouth? Come to this seminar to become aware of non-verbal communication and its impact on how others perceive you. In this seminar, you’ll have the chance to learn, discuss, and demonstrate professional non-verbal and verbal communication skills. Before you know it, you’ll be speaking the language of ‘effective communication.’
item.name: Body Language: What Language Are You Speaking?
